sub_title: Senior Finance Specialist | CPA based in NL looking for a new challenge
summary:
As a Senior Finance Specialist I have been working for 9 years at TEI, a leading company in the aerospace industry that produces and maintains aircraft engines, I leverage my Master's degree in Economics and my certification as a Public Accountant in Turkey to deliver high-quality financial services and solutions. I have over 9 years of experience in finance and business development roles, with a proven track record of success and innovation.

My core competencies include Financial Reporting, Accounting Operations, Compliance, Auditing, Policies and Procedures, Stakeholder Engagement, and Problem-Solving. I have successfully supported the financial system establishment and coordination of the Turkish Utility Helicopter Project, a major contract between TEI, TAI, GE Aviation, and other suppliers, as well as the evaluation and preparation of various financial reports, such as annual and monthly reports, R&D project costs, sales parts, and taxation. I am proficient in MS Excel and SAP, and have strong communication and analytical skills. I am passionate about contributing to the advancement and growth of the aerospace industry, and I am always eager to learn new skills and technologies. (Authorized to work in the Netherlands.)
